page.title: 12CHILD'S DAY, CALDER VALE 2
page.content: When I get home I do some jobs like setting the table, washing and drying the dishes. Later I play out for half an hour. At 5.30 my mum comes home and makes our tea. When I have finished I go out again and play with my friend. Sometimes we play a game called 'Tin Can a-Lurkey' which is a bit like Hide and Seek. I play this with my brother in my neighbours' back gardens. At about 8.45p.m. I go in and it's time for bed. If it's Wednesday my Dad takes me down to Garstang for Brownies, but I am usually home by eight o'clock.
